entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
